meanings.sent1: The dizzying ride on the spinning teacups made me feel sick.
meanings.sent2: The tall roller coaster had a dizzying drop that thrilled the riders.
meanings.sent3: The dizzying speed of the merry-go-round made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her dizzying dance moves were like a whirlwind on the dance floor.
meanings.sent5: The dizzying heights of the Ferris wheel offered a breathtaking view of the fairground.

meanings.sent1: The car sped by at a dizzying pace, leaving dust in its wake.
meanings.sent2: The runner set a new record with a dizzying sprint to the finish line.
meanings.sent3: The dizzying speed of the cheetah amazed the zoo visitors.
meanings.sent4: The stock market experienced a dizzying rise in prices overnight.
meanings.sent5: The dizzying excitement of the concert left the crowd buzzing with energy.
